document_data.name: House of the Wise Unicorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Wise Unicorn''' was a rental club in [[Nesmé]] run by [[Nistlor Lothlyn]], who was assisted by sixteen guards. No spellcasting was allowed within the premises.
document_data.Services: It cost 5 [[gold piece]]s per night to rent a room and the Unicorn offered drinks by the bottle.
